UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Development of chimeric peptides to facilitate the neutralisation of lipopolysaccharides during bactericidal targeting of multidrug-resistant Escherichia coli.
Literature.Author: Wang Z, Liu X, Mao R, Hao Y, Yang N, Wang X, Li Z, Wang J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli CVCC 195(MIC=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli CVCC 1515(MIC=>64µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>64µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum CVCC 533(MIC=>64µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum CVCC 1809(MIC=>64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CICC 10419(MIC=>64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>64µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis CVCC 3936(MIC=>64µg/ml),Streptococcus suis CVCC 606(MIC=>64µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=16µg/ml),Listeria ivanovii ATCC 19119(MIC=>64µg/ml),Candida albicans CGMCC 2.2411(MIC=>64µg/ml)
